page.title: 08FRUIT AND VEGETABLE FARM
page.content: Mr and Mrs Burgess own this farm which borders the A427,known as Carlton Farm. They have a picnic area and shop. Customers may also pick their own produce.The first fruit to be picked in the year are strawberries,raspberries & gooseberries.Vegetables are available all the year round. There is also a plant nursery,sheltered from the wind by wire mesh.Hedging bushes,herbs and herbaceous plants are on sale here. The shop opened in Spring 1985,closely followed by the plant nursery.There are also 40 bee hives on the farm providing honey for sale in the shop. Eggs are also on sale provided by hens kept near the picnic area.Cream teas are served in the busy season.
